name: YouTube bigger HD player for transparent player
description:
This userstyle enlarges the HTML player of the new transparent YouTube player.
To enable this player, use TestTube: https://www.youtube.com/testtube

The CSS is optimized for 720p videos but you can edit the height to 1080px if you want to.
additional_info:
2016-05-25:
- Improved player size in Windows (no horizontal scrollbar anymore)

2016-05-21:
– Fixed a problem with smaller resolutions (e. g. MacBook Air 1440×900 px)

2016-04-30:
– Fixed thumbnail position after newest update of the player.
